name: INUMEDA
description:
INUMEDA was developed with the goal of providing a fresh gaming experience by revamping the battle system while retaining the charm of Turn Based RPGs.
For many, this experience will be a journey in pursuit of an "interesting mystery.



You wake up alone in this strange world.
You possess the power to purify and cleanse the corruption of attacking enemies, bringing them under your dominion.
You combine the power of your friends to activate powerful abilities.
You can begin your journey here as many times as you wish.
